item.title: Latex cheat sheets
item.description:
Introduction to LaTeX Link to heading

In this tutorial, you will learn some of the basics on how to use $\LaTeX$ to display equations in Jupyter notebooks. For looking up symbols you may need, you can use any of the many cheat sheets you can find by asking Google. I have provided a few that will come up often in this course at the end of this lesson.
